lines.text:
Capacitors, along with Energy Ports, are upgradable via crafting.  A default Capacitor has a maximum transfer rate of 256 RF/t and a capacity of 2,500,000 RF.
Combining 2 Capacitors in a crafting grid combines the figures, providing a Capacitor with a max transfer rate of 512 RF/t and a capacity of 5,000,000 RF.
